params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.language_hints
params.description: Language hint can be specified if the language to be detected is known a priori. It can increase the accuracy of the detection. Language hint must be language code in BCP-47 format. Automatic language detection is performed if no hint is provided.

params.name: data.model
params.description: Model to use for text detection. Supported values: "builtin/stable" (the default if unset) and "builtin/latest".

methods.name: getLanguageHints
methods.description:
Language hint can be specified if the language to be detected is known a priori. It can increase the accuracy of the detection. Language hint must be language code in BCP-47 format.

Automatic language detection is performed if no hint is provided.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string language_hints = 1;

methods.name: setLanguageHints
methods.description:
Language hint can be specified if the language to be detected is known a priori. It can increase the accuracy of the detection. Language hint must be language code in BCP-47 format.

Automatic language detection is performed if no hint is provided.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string language_hints = 1;

Supported values: "builtin/stable" (the default if unset) and "builtin/latest".
